Dialog: Want a cup of coffee?
Latte. Thanks.
It’s 3.45 dollars.
Do you have a Reward card?
Yes … damn. I left it in my house.
Don’t worry. Bring it next time.
The reward card is a joke- isn’t it?
The businessman believe it can let people buy more.
But people just forget the card right after they turn around.
Well- I do have the card.
And I have already collect 9 seals.
Well- man- don’t take it serious. It's just a joke.
And- in fact- the reward card always let you buy something you don’t really need.
There is nothing about the money.
I’ll be back. Bye.
It’s raining. You’ll get wet.
Stay here until the rain stops.
It’s raining. You’ll get wet.
Stay here until the rain stops.
Want a cup of coffee?
Want a cup of coffee?
Want a cup of coffee?
Want a cup of coffee?
It’s raining. You’ll get wet.
Stay here until the rain stops.
Why the rain is Hallucinogenic?
No one knows.
When it will stop?
No one knows.
Boy- take care.  It’s not fun to play in the rain.
I need to go home. Can you help?
I’m working now.
But I can send you to the next block.
Thank you.
